about: The Earth System Modeling Framework (ESMF) is a suite of software tools for developing high-performance, multi-component Earth science modeling applications.
repository for the Functionally Assembled Terrestrial Ecosystem Simulator (FATES)
Repository for MPAS models and shared framework releases.
RTE+RRTMGP is a set of codes for computing radiative fluxes in planetary atmospheres.
AOMP is an open source Clang/LLVM based compiler with added support for the OpenMP® API on Radeon™ GPUs. Use this repository for releases, issues, documentation, packaging, and examples.
GOCART Aerosol model including process library and framework interfaces (MAPL, NUOPC, and CCPP)
COSP - The CFMIP (Cloud Feedbacks Model Intercomparison Project) Observation Simulator Package
MAPL is a foundation layer of the GEOS architecture, whose original purpose is to supplement the Earth System Modeling Framework (ESMF)
Energy Exascale Earth System Model source code. NOTE: use "maint" branches for your work. Head of master is not validated.
